channel.title: 517 Help
channel.description:
Okay, I'm trying to make a clean base, so i am going through everything and doing stuff.
1. How to move a NPC from one location to another? 2. How to fix unhandled packets? (Unhandled Npc option 1: 143) 3. How to add stocks to a npc that trades stuff? 4. how to make all the options that you right click an npc with?
thanks anyone that responds.
to help me quicker please add me on msn: ZackBoudreaux@live.com
